00040   static std::string format(std::string s, std::string line_break) {
00041     std::stringstream si(s); // input stream
00042     std::stringstream r;    // result stream
00043     std::string line;
00044     while (getline(si, line)) {
00045       // skip white space
00046       while (!line.empty() && line[0] == ' ')
00047         line = std::string(line, 1);
00048       if (!line.empty())
00049         r << "# " << line << line_break;
00050     }
00051     return r.str();
00052   }
